templateData.kat:
The Slug Pet can have its rarity upgraded from {{Epic}} all the way up to {{Legendary}} by Kat. When upgrading [[Pets]] through Kat the pet will keep all of its Pet Experience. However due to the scaling EXP needed the pet will lose some [[Pets#Leveling|Pet Levels]] depending on the new rarity. Kat will reduce the amount of {{Coins}} needed per level of the Pet. This discount is {{color|green|0.3%}} per level of the base price. {{Kat Cost |cost_epic_level_1 = {{Coins|10,000,000}}
1 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_compost.png|25px|link=Compost Bundle]] [[Compost Bundle]] |cost_epic_level_100 = {{Coins|7,000,000}}
1 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_compost.png|25px|link=Compost Bundle]] [[Compost Bundle]] |time_epic = 7 Days }}
